title: @Riot! Thankyou!
body: Hextech Annie, Spirit Guard Udyr are just some of the beast skins that I got today with the new Project boxes! They are such better value and I would like to say Riot, you have done an outstanding job with this system in place. Worth every RP doing it. Are these boxes permanent? If yes I would like to make a suggestion. I have so many project cores left over and they have no use since I have the project skins. Maybe implement a dis-enchant for some Essence or something like that. Otherwise they are sitting ducks. Are these project boxes permanent? Thumbs up Riot{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: I don't think they are permanent as they are only like the "exclusive" thing that comes with the release of 3 new project skins.
